snippet.title: TACTICAL ASSAULT VR Trailer | CQB Shooter | Oculus Quest 2
snippet.description:
TACTICAL ASSAULT VR for stand-alone Oculus/META Quest 2 headsets

Download the demo on SideQuest:
https://sidequestvr.com/app/8699/tactical-assault-vr-demo

Support the project by purchasing the Early Access release:
https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/5190911237633299/

Follow Tactical Assault VR on Discord:
https://discord.gg/ygzEuQ7Tzt

Become part of an elite special forces unit and use real world CQB (Close Quarters Battles) tactics to clear rooms, breach doors and take down the enemy threat.

FEATURES:

• Utilize an arsenal of weapons, scopes, sight attachments, explosives and equipment to strategize your next move.

• Take note of simulated wind and target distance with the wind meter and spotter scope to calculate physics-based bullet drop and time-to-hit.

• Use stealth to sneak up behind enemies with a silent knife kill. Or go head-to-head against enemies that will take cover and attempt to flank your position.

• Every mission re-play randomizes enemy positions and doors requiring you to stay alert for every play-through. Clearing rooms has never been more nerve-wracking. Replayability is endless.

• Maps are non-linear, giving players an endless amount of variety in how they choose to approach each mission. Enter buildings through doors, climb ladders to reach rooftops or climb through windows. The choice is yours.

GAMEPLAY:

Choose between 2 modes (Shootout and Missions) for added variety.

• SHOOTOUT: Take on waves of enemies in this arcade-style mode. Can you survive all of the waves?

• MISSIONS: Complete objective-based missions that range from intel gathering, hostage rescue, demolitions and bomb defusal.

#OculusQuest2 #VirtualReality #MetaQuest2
